lead_paragraph: Arsene Wenger would be an ideal England coach and the Football Association should be prepared to wait until his Arsenal contract runs out in order to appoint the Frenchman, former FA executive director David Davies has said.

headline.print_headline: England Should Wait for Wenger, Says Former FA Chief
headline.main: England Should Wait for Wenger, Says Former FA Chief

snippet: Arsene Wenger would be an ideal England coach and the Football Association should be prepared to wait until his Arsenal contract runs out in order to appoint the Frenchman, former FA executive director David Davies has said....
